title: The Evil Empires Edition
description:
On this week’s episode of Slate Money, Emily, Felix, and Anna discuss the New York Times Magazine story on the Murdoch family, the Bezos’ divorce settlement and Saudi Aramco. 
In the Slate Plus segment: Congestion pricing in Manhattan.
Email: slatemoney@slate.comTwitter: @felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas,@EmilyRPeck
Podcast production by Jessamine Molli
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
